original_text: (for the law made nothing perfect), and a better hope is introduced, by which we draw near to God.
korean_text: (율법은 아무 것도 온전하게 못할지라) 이에 더 좋은 소망이 생기니 이것으로 우리가 하나님께 가까이 가느니라

sentences.original_text: for the law made nothing perfect
and a better hope is introduced
by which we draw near to God
